title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Complete the assignment on propulsion systems, covering topics A, B, and C.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze different combustion processes and submit the report.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a nozzle for a rocket engine and present your findings.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Prepare for and take the quiz on basic aerodynamics principles.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform a flow analysis on a given model and document your results.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze the heating patterns in different materials and submit your findings.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Complete the task on structural design, focusing on material strength.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Perform calculations for orbital mechanics problems and submit the worksheet.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Study for and take the final exam in systems engineering.
